articles.author: Carla Carriveau
articles.description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission under Chair Gensler is a rigid challenger of the crypto industry in its aggressive application of an age-old regime to digital assets.  Even without the 97 enforcement actions and billions in imposed penalties, the SEC has effectively impaired the industry from advancing digital innovation and technology by stalling approval …
  Forcing Utility On The SEC Read More »
articles.title: Forcing Utility On The SEC

articles.description: A new proposal seeks to drastically overhaul $COMP incentives.
articles.title: Why Compound Might Ditch its Yield Farmers

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: Leading crypto projects have banded together to offer $7M in prizes to teams innovating using zero-knowledge (ZK) proofs.
articles.title: Ethereum Foundation, AMD, Polkadot Launch $7M Competition to Boost Zero-Knowledge Scaling

articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: Tornado Cash is blacklisting sanctioned addresses from its website in conjunction with Chainalysis.
articles.title: Ethereum Mixer Blocks North Korean Hacker Group Behind $600M Axie Infinity Heist Tornado Cash’s advocacy of financial freedom does not extend to enemies of the United States.

articles.title: Uniswap Launches Swap Widget For Third-Party Apps
